equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill by <text class='c_random'>12.6%</text>, up to <text class='c_random'>63%</text>.

equipment.name: Choker
base_affixes: Critical Strikes with <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills increase your Attack Speed by <text class='c_random'>23%</text> for <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Helm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.

equipment.name: Circle
strikethrough_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>147.86%</text> increased damage for <text class='c_number'>8.4</text> seconds after the <text class='c_important'>Shadowblight</text> Key Passive damages enemies <text class='c_number'>14</text> times.
added_affixes:
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Your Shadow Damage Over Time effects have a <text class='c_random'>35.94%</text> chance to generate <text class='c_number'>4.2</text> Essence. 
Damage from your <text class='c_important'>Shadowblight</text> Key Passive will always generate <text class='c_number'>2.8</text> Essence.

equipment.name: Khopesh
base_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Minions</text> gain increased damage while alive, up to <text class='c_random'>53.67%</text> after <text class='c_number'>14</text> seconds.
+11.2% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +7.28% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Molten Lotus
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>25.38%</text> Attack Speed.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>22.6%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>8.4</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>45.21%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Boneweave Treads
base_affixes: Every <text class='c_number'>11.2</text> seconds, your Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals <text class='c_random'>0.74</text> Cold damage and continuously <text class='c_important'><u>Chills</u></text> enemies for <text class='c_number'>11.2%</text> over <text class='c_number'>8.4</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>4.64</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>90</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>47.21%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

equipment.name: Archon Faulds
base_affixes: Your Minions gain <text class='c_random'>27.6%</text> increased Damage Reduction.
